content.question: At a national convention attended by many educators, about 30 percent of the attendees are from the northeast. Of all the attendees of the national convention, 25 will be selected at random to receive a free book. What are the mean and standard deviation of the sampling distribution of the proportion of attendees from the northeast for samples of size 25 ?

choices.label: The mean is 30 and the standard deviation is <math alttext="the square root of the fraction 30 times 70 over 25" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>30</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>70</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mrow><mn>25</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mstyle></math>.

The mean is 30 and the standard deviation is <math alttext="the square root of the fraction 25 times 5 over 30" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>25</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mrow><mn>30</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mstyle></math>.

The mean is 0.3 and the standard deviation is <math alttext="the square root of the fraction 0.3 times 0.7 over 25" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>0.3</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>0.7</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mrow><mn>25</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mstyle></math>.

The mean is 0.03 and the standard deviation is <math alttext="the square root of the fraction 0.03 times 0.97 over 25" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>0.03</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>0.97</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mrow><mn>25</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mstyle></math>.

The mean is 7.5 and the standard deviation is <math alttext="the square root of the fraction 7.5 times 17.5 over 25" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>7.5</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>17.5</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mrow><mn>25</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mstyle></math>.

content.answer: The mean is 0.3 and the standard deviation is <math alttext="the square root of the fraction 0.3 times 0.7 over 25" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>0.3</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>0.7</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mrow><mn>25</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mstyle></math>.

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Determine parameters for probability distributions.
